name: Doors Open & Early Bird
description: Doors open at 10 AM. Bingo starts at 10:30 AM. Pay-as-you-go electronic games available.

pricing.paper: Spend $1+ for 1 free paper card. Spend $2+ for unlimited paper.

name: Daytime Pay-As-You-Go
description: Fast-paced daytime bingo. Pay only for the machines you want to play. Super 6 Jackpots ($250) start at 12 PM.

pricing.paper: Spend $1+ for 1 free paper card. Spend $2+ for unlimited paper.

name: Afternoon Pay-As-You-Go
description: Super 6 Jackpots ($250) at the top of each hour. Bingo Babes Progressive ($200 guaranteed) played after 4 PM Super 6.

pricing.paper: Spend $1+ for 1 free paper card. Spend $2+ for unlimited paper.
pricing.pullTabs: Available the majority of the time we are open

name: Session Sales Open
description: Buy your session cards for the main 7:30 PM session. Early buyers get best card selection.

sessionBuyIn.twoMachines: $22 (Best Value: Includes 6-packs, double actions, and letter X papers)
sessionBuyIn.note: Two machines for $22 is the best value

name: Evening Gala Session
description: Our main nightly session. Features Treasure Hunts, Lucky 7, UPIK, Odd-Even Coverall, and Letter X. Hornet Progressive ($250 guaranteed) played after Letter X.

sessionBuyIn.twoMachines: $22 (Best Value: Includes 6-packs, double actions, and letter X papers)
sessionBuyIn.note: Spend $2 or more to receive as many paper cards as you'd like

pricing.pullTabs: Available the majority of the time we are open

specials.Mon: Good Neighbor: 5× Pull Tabs, $250 Jackpot Neighbor Send-Out
specials.Thu: Good Neighbor: 5× Pull Tabs, $250 Jackpot Neighbor Send-Out
specials.Tue: Free 9-On, 1 free machine with session buy-in
specials.Wed: 1 free machine, Week of Free Bingo Promotion ($100 single-winner, 7 days free bingo)
specials.Sat: Alternates Monthly: Either $40 All-You-Can-Play or Pay-As-You-Go Specials

name: Sunday Premier Session
description: Sundays are special. 15× $250 jackpots + free dinner. Features Speedy, Super 3, and UPIK.

sessionBuyIn.twoMachines: $22 (Best Value: Includes 6-packs, double actions, and letter X papers)

sundayGames.upik: $1 per card / 6 for $5 (FREE card included with session)

specials.Sun: Sunday Spectacular: 15× $250 Jackpots, Free Dinner for all players, and $500 Weekly UPIK

name: Late Night Bingo Bash
description: Fast-paced, shorter-format games for night owls. Music, energy, late-night luck.

pricing.note: Spend $2 or more to receive as many paper cards as you'd like

note: May continue until 10-11 PM depending on play
